Class MainMenu

java.lang.Object
MainMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
public class MainMenu
extends java.lang.Object
implements Printable
Main Menu class is a class that hold all menu functions to be used in the main RunBank file, implements Printable
Since:
October 27, 2020
See Also:
RunBank, Printable

    • mainMenu

      public static void mainMenu​(java.util.ArrayList<Customer> acc)
      a function that displays the main menu used to select and perform common banking functions such as:
      • inquire balance
      • transfer money
      • deposit money
      • withdraw money
      • pay someone
      • exit
      Parameters:
      acc - The array list containing the accounts of the bank

    • paySomeoneSubMenu

      public static void paySomeoneSubMenu​(Customer currentAcc, java.util.ArrayList<Customer> acc, java.lang.String fromWhere, java.lang.String toWhere, int toUserIndex, double actionAmount)
      function to transfer money from the current customer to another customer
      Parameters:
      currentAcc - the current account and account that will be paying
      acc - the account that payer is transferring to

    • transactionLog

      public static void transactionLog​(java.lang.String transactionType, java.lang.String userName, java.lang.String otherUserName, double amount, java.lang.String fromAccount, java.lang.String toAccount)
      this method creates a file called "transactionLog.txt" that contains user actions they've performed
      Parameters:
      transactionType - the type of transactions mirrored from the main menu options:
      • inquire balance
      • transfer money
      • deposit money
      • withdraw money
      • pay someone
      • exit
      userName - the name of the logged into account
      otherUserName - the name of a secondary account used in "pay someone"
      amount - the amount of money used in the action
      fromAccount - name of account a transfer/action is from
      toAccount - name of account a transfer/action is to

    • newBalanceSheet

      public static void newBalanceSheet​(java.util.ArrayList<Customer> customerArrayList)
      This method is used to keep track of the new balances on a csv file called newBalanceSheet.csv
      Parameters:
      customerArrayList - Receives customer array list.

      method that prints the balance of Checking, savings, and credit of an account
      Specified by:
      printBalance in interface Printable
      Parameters:
      accountList - the list of accounts in the bank
      i - the index of the account we want from accountList
      accountType - the account type
